ComicInfo.Summary:
Lobster Johnson tries to distract the little demons from destroying the earth by feeding them pancakes.
Lots of little mini-Hellboys in Hell are really happy to see him because now they can destroy the world. Lobster Johnson goes to get help.
Liz feels right at home in Hell because of all the fire.
Both Hecate and Baba Yaga fall in love with Roger, so Baba casts a spell to split him in two.
When everyone finds out what Baba Yaga can do they pester her until she gets angry and banishes everyone to Hell (but the kids aren't supposed to say that word).
Hellboy and Liz are making breakfast and Hellboy wants Baba Yaga to make their pancakes really big.
